title: Silver crashes 25 % to log worst single - day fall in 15 years . What drove the turmoil and what next for investors ?
description: Silver experienced a dramatic 27% plunge on MCX, falling from a record high of Rs 4 lakh to Rs 2.91 lakh per kg. This sharp reversal followed a strong rally, with a stronger US dollar, gold's decline, and profit booking cited as key factors. Despite the correction, silver's industrial demand and supply deficits suggest potential for future gains., Silver experienced a dramatic 27% plunge on MCX, falling from a record high of Rs 4 lakh to Rs 2.91 lakh per kg.
